message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11,250. Can we agree on that price?
